data.name: checkBoxExpiryDate.Text
data.value: Stop recording on the following date/time:

data.name: checkAppendRecordingDetails.Text
data.value: Append recording details (channel name, schedule, etc)

data.name: labelFilename.Text
data.value: Specify the name of the file (date and time will be added automatically):

data.name: labelSaveLocation.Text
data.value: Select where to save the recording:

data.name: comboSchedulerAlreadyRunning.Items2
data.value: Wait for previous recording to end and start recording

data.name: labelSchedulerConcurrent.Text
data.value: If a previous programming of this recording is not over yet:

data.name: checkSchedulerDeleteTask.Text
data.value: If the recording is not scheduled again, delete the task after:

data.name: checkSchedulerRetry.Text
data.value: If the recording task fails, try again after

data.name: checkSchedulerASAP.Text
data.value: Start recording as soon as possible if the schedule is missed

data.name: labelSchedulerFolder.Text
data.value: Select where to create the recording task in Windows Task Scheduler:
